SourceText: Time for some fun! ü§∏üèæ Let's play together!
Tell me a bit about your child so I can share the best play ideas for you! üé≤‚ú®
text: Awungitshele kancane ngengane yakho. Ngingakwabela imibono yemidlalo elungile! üé≤‚ú®

SourceText: Tap 'Let‚Äôs Play!' and I‚Äôll share a simple, fun, and free activity you can do together!
text: Cindezela 'Masidlale!' ngizokwabela umsebenzi olula nokhululekile eningawenza ndawonye!

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
See you next time! You can message {PLAY} whenever you would like another easy and fun play idea.
text: Ngizokubona ngokulandelayo! Ungangibhalela umyalezo{PLAY} uma nje uzizwa udinga eminye imibono yomdlalo ojabulisayo.

SourceText: I can do more than just play! üéâ In this chat, you can also get ParentText.
text: Ngingenza okuningi ngaphandle kokudlala! üéâKule ngxoxo, ungathola ne ParentText.

SourceText: ParentText can help you improve your relationship with your child in just 5 days‚Äîtotally free!
text: I parentText ingakusiza ukuthuthkisa ubudlelwane nengane yakho ngezinsuku ezinhlanu - mahala!

SourceText: Want to give it a try?
That's okay. If you change your mind, you can always message {PLAY} if you want another activity or {START} if you want to start the programme.
text: Kulungile. Uma ushintsha umqondo wakho, ungabhala umyalezo{PLAY} uma ufuna omunye umsebenzi noma{START} uma ufuna ukuqala uhlelo.

SourceText: You entered @results.number. Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Ufake @results. Sicela ufake inamba ephakathi kuka 0 no 17.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You entered @results.number. This looks too old. Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Ufake @results.number. Kubukeka emdala. Sicela ufake inamba ephakathi kuka 0 no 17.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.  Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Uxolo, angiqondi ukuthi uthini. Sicela ubhale inombolo ephakathi kuka 0 no 17.

SourceText: What language works best for you?
Quick question for you! ü§î What are the benefits of play?
Absolutely! Play is fun ‚Äì and it also helps your child grow and supports both your mental health and your child‚Äôs.
text: Ngempela kunjalo! Ukudlala kumnandi - futhi kusiza ingane yakho ikhule futhi kweseka impilo yengqondo yengane yakho.

SourceText: Want to learn more? Complete the full survey here: {IOGT link}
text: Ufuna ukufunda okwengeziwe? Gcwalisa inhlovo ephelele lapha: {IOGT link}

SourceText: Yes! Play can boost your mood and reduce stress ‚Äì and it also encourages your child‚Äôs development in ways that are fun for you both.
text: Yebo! ukudlala kungakhuphula isimo sengqondo nokwehlisa ingcindezi - futhi ikhuthaza ukuthuthuka kwengane yakho ngendlela enenjabulo kunina nobabili.

SourceText: That‚Äôs right! Play builds important life skills ‚Äì and it also supports emotional wellbeing for both you and your child in a fun way.
text: Kulungile! Ukudlala kwakha amakhono empilo abalulekile - futhi isekela isimo sengqondo senu nobabili nengane yakho ngendlela ejabulisayo.

SourceText: Exactly! Play is fun, it supports mental health, and it helps your child grow ‚Äì all at the same time. Everyone wins!
text: Ncamashi! Ukudlala kuyajabulisa, kweseka impilo yengqondo, futhi isiza ukuthi ingane yakho ikhule - konke ngesikhathi esisodwa. Wonke umuntu uyawina!

SourceText: Message {PLAY} to get a simple, fun activity that you can do with your child. ü§∏üèæ
text: Bhala u {PLAY} ukuze uthole umsebenzi olula ojabulisayo ongawenza nengane yakho. ü§∏üèæ
